text.section:
On determining that a chimney contributed to causing a fire, the State Fire Marshal or the local authority with jurisdiction over fire investigations shall file with the State Fire Marshal a report that identifies the chimney as:
a lined, masonry chimney;
an unlined, masonry chimney; or
a prefabricated, metal chimney.
The State Fire Marshal shall establish and maintain a repository of reports filed in accordance with subsection (a) of this section.
